mapper.select: select * from schedule where apt_seq = #{aptSeq}, authority= 0
mapper.insert: insert into schedule values(schedule_Seq.nextval, #{contents}, to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{aptSeq}, #{title}, #{backgroundColor}, #{dong}, #{authority})
mapper.update: update schedule set contents= #{contents}, title=#{title}, start_Date= to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), end_Date= to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), background_Color=#{backgroundColor}, dong=#{dong}, authority=#{authority} where schedule_Seq=#{scheduleSeq}
